text: Ani nihsansaya, amhi musa (alai.) La grantha pradana kela hota tevha tyacyatahi matabheda kela gela ani jara ti gosta nasati ji tumacya palanakartyatarphe ya adhica niscita jhaleli ahe, tara tyancya daramyana (kevhaca) phaisala jhala asata. He loka tara tyacyavisayi sakta becaina karanarya sansayata aheta
